NewFeatures: Added configurable update timer & toggle to log updates to console
[Hideout] Collapsable display of total items required for all hideout upgrades (next level upgrades only)
[Collector] Collapsable display of in progress quests, their conditions, and status

Changes: [Hideout] Improved compatibility with mods that changed item names to be functionally unreadable for users

NewFeatures: Tracks Hideout Construction and Requirement progress
